name: Should
description:
How often do you avoid doing a chore but because you should be doing the chore you don't let yourself do anything fun or productive and you end up spending far too much time doing something unenjoyable and pointless like scrolling through social media posts that disgruntle you or reading enraging reddit comments?

I do that a lot.

Join me on a text-based exploration of what you think you should be doing and maybe we can find a way out of that.

Do or do not. There is no should.
